body:
Your dream doesnâ€™t have any expiry date.
Take a deep breath, and try again...
Stay #Strong. You are bigger than the #Problems you have.
The #Fool didn't know it was #Impossible, so he did it.
The man who moves mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
If your goals are more important than parties then, Welcome to 1% Club.
I don't know the key to #Success, but the key to #Failure is pleasing every body.
#Running away from your problems is a #Race, where you will #Never #Win.
If all you can do is Crawl, Start Crawling.
What are you doing #Today is getting you closer to where you want to be #Tomorrow.
If you can't handle your #Stress, then you can't handle your #Success.
You are so much #Stronger than you #Think.
You are not defeated when you #Fail, you are defeated when you #Quit.
A Successful warrior is an #Average Man with #LaserLike Focus.
You should either get busy #Learning, or you should get busy #Earning.
If you #wakeup without #goals, then go back to #sleep.
